description: His6-rmTG2 is based on clone IRAKp961C066Q. It is N-terminally fused to a hexahistidine-tag resulting in the encoded N-terminal amino acid sequence MHHHHHHAEELLL…. His6-rmTG2 is produced in E. coli and purified by ion metal chelating chromatography to more than 95 % purity.
name: Mouse tissue transglutaminase
